TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpContextWrapper extends System.Web.HttpContextBase

summary.span: 封装 HTTP 内部对象，该对象包含有关单个 HTTP 请求的 HTTP 特定信息。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that contains HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并作为包装器类。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 此类公开的功能类，还公开类型。This class exposes the functionality of the class and also exposes the type. 类，可替换的原始实现使用自定义实现，如当你执行单元测试 ASP.NET 管道外部应用程序中的类。The class lets you replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

param.name: handler
param.span: 应处理请求的对象。

span.span: The object that should process the request.

summary.span: 用于为请求指定处理程序。

span.span: Enables you to specify a handler for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你设置`handler`到`null`，默认处理程序用于处理该请求。If you set `handler` to `null`, the default handler is used to process the request. 你可以设置`handler`到异步处理程序或同步的处理程序。You can set `handler` to either an asynchronous handler or to an synchronous handler. 处理程序必须实现接口。The handler must implement the interface.

exception.span: 方法是在发生 事件之后调用的。

span.span: The method was called after the event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基方法。The method overrides the base method. 实现基方法，方法调用方法类并将传递`sessionStateBehavior`设置。To implement the base method, the method calls the method of the class and passes the `sessionStateBehavior` setting.
